ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: The course is very demanding, yet students can not imagine how much they would benefit from it until they finish the course. I now feel that I can make a line of history between my knowledge about Arabic tradition befor and after this course.

Certainly, I would recommend this course. In fact, the knowledge that is acquired by the students during this course is alone would satisfy them since the knowledge the course offers was an invaluable tool to acquire later knowledge in the field and to produce and present scholarly opinion.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: My answer can be found in the previous responses.
